long_description: Flannel might be the official uniform of the outdoors, but the trail-worthy Marmot Doheny Flannel shirt makes a break from the norm with its large-scale plaid and bold colors. Soft, midweight hollow-core polyester provides great warmth by trapping body heat. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Single drop-in chest pocket. Back yoke and chest pocket are cut on the bias for a stylish look.
short_description: Flannel might be the official uniform of the outdoors, but the trail-worthy Marmot Doheny Flannel shirt makes a break from the norm with its large-scale plaid and bold colors.
